Thanks, Colin.  I had completely forgotten about the initial "boxes" experi=
ment!  I'll look up the paper you're referring to as well.

I'm getting spu=
n up on Hierarchical Temporal Memory at the moment.  It's been around for a=
 couple of years, but it's relatively new to me.  I'll have a look at DBNs =
as well for future use.  I heard of them, but I'm not familiar with them, e=
ither.  I'm starting to wonder if one or both of HTMs or DBNs could benefit=
 from CPPNs.  As long as they can be mapped to a substrate and there's some=
 spatio-temporal patterns in the data, I would certainly think so.


-- Chr=
is
